subsection.name: Overview
subsection.p: Two CLI tools are available from GitHub Releases:

subsection.name: descriptor-generator
subsection.p: Generates forge-addon.yaml for addon repositories by combining a config file with pom.xml metadata.
subsection.source:
# Download curl -sLO https://github.com/bloomreach-forge/brxm-marketplace/releases/latest/download/descriptor-generator.jar
# Usage java -jar descriptor-generator.jar [options]
Options: -c, --config <file> Config file path (default: .forge/addon-config.yaml) -o, --output <file> Output file path (default: forge-addon.yaml) -p, --pom <file> POM file path (default: pom.xml) -v, --verbose Enable verbose output -h, --help Show help

subsection.name: manifest-generator
subsection.p: Generates addons-index.json by scanning a GitHub organization for repositories containing forge-addon.yaml files.
subsection.source:
# Download curl -sLO https://github.com/bloomreach-forge/brxm-marketplace/releases/latest/download/manifest-generator.jar
# Usage java -jar manifest-generator.jar [options]
Options: -g, --org <name> GitHub organization to scan (required) -o, --output <file> Output file path (default: addons-index.json) -t, --token <token> GitHub token for API access -v, --verbose Enable verbose output -h, --help Show help
subsection.p: This tool is primarily used by the Marketplace's GitHub Actions workflow to generate the official Forge addon index.
